SEARCH
Package com.jeopardy

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.jeopardy.Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents a Jeopardy game session. Manages players, categories, questions, scoring, and event notifications.

    Constructs a Game instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Constructs a Game instance. Initializes empty player and category lists, sets up event management and logging.

  • Method Details

    • loadGameData

      public void loadGameData(String fileName)
      Loads game data from a file. Determines the file format and uses the appropriate loader.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the path to the file to load

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String name)
      Adds a new player to the game.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player to add

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the game with the added players. Sets the first player as the current player.

    • selectCategory

      public boolean selectCategory(String categoryName)
      Selects a category by name for the current player.
      Parameters:
      categoryName - the name of the category to select
      Returns:
      true if the category exists and was selected, false otherwise

    • selectQuestion

      public Question selectQuestion(int value)
      Selects a question from the current category by its point value.
      Parameters:
      value - the point value of the question to select
      Returns:
      the selected Question if it exists and hasn't been answered, null otherwise

    • answerQuestion

      public void answerQuestion(String answer)
      Submits an answer for the currently selected question. Updates the player's score if correct and marks the question as answered. Advances to the next player.
      Parameters:
      answer - the answer provided by the player

    • generateSummaryReport

      public void generateSummaryReport(String format)
      Generates a summary report of the game in the specified format.
      Parameters:
      format - the report format ("TXT", "PDF", or "DOCX")

    • getPlayers

      public List<Player> getPlayers()
      Retrieves all players in the game.
      Returns:
      a List of Player objects

    • getCategories

      public List<Category> getCategories()
      Retrieves all categories in the game.
      Returns:
      a List of Category objects

    • getEventLog

      public List<GameEvent> getEventLog()
      Retrieves the event log for this game session.
      Returns:
      a List of GameEvent objects that occurred during the game

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Retrieves the current player.
      Returns:
      the current Player object
